CustomField.description: The product type name. This is used for data tables display and should be deleted once their functionality improves.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Product__c),
IF( ISBLANK(DestinationLegacy__c),
PreRequisiteRecommendation__r.Product__r.Name, DestinationLegacy__r.RecordType.Name), Product__r.Name )
CustomField.label: Product name
